name: 周至如
objective:
一.電力設備的故障
二.比壓器,比流器
三.保護電驛的構造及動作原理
四.常用的保護電驛
五.發電機與電動機的保護
六.變壓器的保護
七.線路保護
八.異常電壓的預防
九.熔絲
十.保護協調
schedule:
1.Introductions, scope, definitions, basic concepts and important
issues descriptions.(week 1)
2. power system protection fundamental, problems and solutions..(week 1) 　
3. power system fault characteristics, analysis methods and
protection considerations..(week 2) 　
4. overview the related standards of power system protections and the
protection methodology..(week 3)
5. protective relays performances and their practical aspects on
application and considerations..(week 4)
6. relay system input sources and associated devices especially the
performances of current transformers (CT) and voltage transformer..(week 5)
7. the primary protections with current differential protections
and some backup protection methods..(week 6
8. generator system protections: primary protection descriptions and
protection scheme planning and design. .(week 7)
9. midterm and report, generator system protections:backup and
supplementary protections descriptions..(week 8)
10. generators protection scheme planning and design..(week9)
11. transformer protection planning and design..(week 10)
12. reactor and capacitor bank protection planning and design..(week 11)
13. bus protections planning and design considering various bus
scheme..(week 12)
14. motor protections planning and design considering starting,
abnormal operations and faults..(week 13)
15. substion protection planning: outdoor types and indoor type
based on gas insulated switchgear (GIS)-PART1. .(week 14)　
16. substion protection planning: outdoor types and indoor type
based on gas insulated switchgear (GIS)-PART2..(week 15)
17 transmission line system protections: overhead transmission
lines ..(week 16)
18.transmission line system protections: underground cables ..(week 17)
19.protection associated system stability, final examination ..(week 18)
scorePolicy: .評量方式：期中考佔30%，期末考佔30%，學習報告/作業佔20％，平常表現（含出席率）佔20%。
materials:
本課程依進度進行授課，以課堂講解為主，輔以資料補充,主要教才為：
(1) J. Lewis. Blackburn, Protective Relaying Principles & Application,
Marcel Dekker Inc., 1987
(2) S. H. Horowitz, A. G. Phadke, Power System Relaying, 2nd Edition, John Wiley  &  Sons Inc.1995
(3) A. G. Phadke, J. S. Thorp, Computer Relaying for Power System,John Wiley  &  Sons Inc.1998
(4) J. Lewis,  Blackburn, Tmomas, J. Domin, Protective Relaying Principles & Application,
CRC Press Taylor & Francis Group, LLC,  2006
